name: Rapidly Approaching Biped
description:
A girl wakes up  next to a marble statue. it glows purple. 

Guided by a map carved into the floor, she traverses the branching hallways, in search for the three magic circles that can shatter the north gate.

wasd movement

shift sprint (stamina based)

space dialogue control

mouse cursor light direction control

alternate controls

arrow keys movement

alt sprint
